#define PKSAV_POKEDEX_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES (   num_pokemon)    ((num_pokemon / 8) + 1)

Function Documentation

◆ pksav_get_pokedex_bit()

enum pksav_error pksav_get_pokedex_bit ( const uint8_t *  p_buffer,
uint16_t  pokedex_num,
bool *  p_result_out 
)

Check if a given Pokémon has been seen/caught in the Pokédex's native representation.

In a seen/caught buffer, each Pokémon is represented by a single bit. This function calculates which bit that is based on the National Pokédex number and checks it.

Parameters
rawPokédex buffer
pokedex_numWhich Pokémon to check
result_outwhere result is returned
Returns
if Pokémon with the given Pokédex number has been seen/caught

◆ pksav_set_pokedex_bit()

enum pksav_error pksav_set_pokedex_bit ( uint8_t *  p_buffer,
uint16_t  pokedex_num,
bool  set 
)

Set whether or not a given Pokémon has been seen/caught.

In a seen/caught buffer, each Pokémon is represented by a single bit. This function calculates which bit that is based on the National Pokédex number and checks it.

Parameters
rawPokédex buffer
pokedex_numWhich Pokémon to set or unset
setSet whether or not Pokémon has been seen/caught
